name: Out of Controller!
description:
The idea was that you play as a controller in an infinite runner style game, and gradually gain controls that you lost at the beginning of the game. At first, you gain back the ability to jump, then the ability to move up and down, and eventually full 4 directional movement. 

Built in Phaser and Typescript!

Credits

Shutterstock, Kenney Assets

Programmed by CM
